snippet.title: Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard (Winona Ryder, Lily Rose Depp, JK Rowling)
snippet.description:
Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard (Winona Ryder, Lily Rose Depp, JK Rowling)
Subscribe to Viral Film Talk 👉 https://rebrand.ly/t6e2tmk

WATCH NEXT 👇
Amber Heard's Lawyer Quits And Exposes Her For Ruining Johnny Depp's Career
https://youtu.be/eJHyMaerh3k

Related Videos:

10 Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard
https://youtu.be/gECq8x8b6bo

Penelope Cruz And Wynona Ryder Defend Johnny Depp
https://youtu.be/jTMFnK9vKoo

Robert Downey Jr. Steps Up For Johnny Depp Since Disney Won't
https://youtu.be/YG2dPHN3NsE

Number 10: Laura Divenere 
Despite that she was once Amber Heard’s friend, Laura Divenere made the right choice by testifying against Amber in court. In her statement, she stated that she did not see any bruises on Amber after her alleged fight with Johnny on the 24th of May 2016. It is clear that Amber was lying. 

Number 9: Sia 
Out of nowhere, Sia popped up on Twitter where she made it known that she was in support of Depp. She tweeted and I quote; “Just showing my public support for Johnny Depp. He is clearly the victim after hearing those tapes.” Sia just wants to see Amber brought to justice and the truth is everyone does. 

Number 8: Penelope Cruz
Penelope Cruz said that although many years had passed and they had made numerous movies together, she saw him as an awesome friend. She also said that she was impressed with his unique sense of humor, his brilliant mind, and his kindness. She also mentioned that she was grateful for the time Johnny spent with her while she was pregnant. There is a low chance someone who did something that kind would hurt anyone. 

Number 7: Vanessa Paradis
Vanessa Paradis clearly defended Johnny by saying that the statement Amber made against him was a lie. In her statement, she also mentioned that she had known Johnny for more than 25 years and that they raised two kids together which she really loved doing. She mentioned that through those 25 years, Johnny was a kind, attentive, affectionate person. 

Number 6: Winona Ryder
Winona Ryder publicly pledged her support for Johnny. She said that she could not wrap her head around the accusations and knew him as an honest and good man. She also said that he was an incredible, caring, and loving guy who protected her and also the people he cared about. She really pointed out that Johnny was a complete gentleman when they were dating.

Number 5: Paul Bettany
Paul Bettany supported Johnny on Twitter by tweeting that he had known Depp for many years and that he was the most gentle, kindest, and the sweetest man he had ever known. 

Number 4: Lily-Rose Depp 
Lily-Rose Depp did a really good job defending her father against Amber Heard’s claims. She posted an old picture of her and her dad when she was a baby. She captioned it stating her dad was a wonderful father to her and her brother. With all this, she just wanted everyone to know that there was no proof of anything and Amber just kept on making false claims. 

Number 3: JK Rowling
JK Rowling made a public statement after deciding with the studio executives not to remove Johnny from the Fantastic Beasts movie sequence. According to this statement, the studio recast Depp after hearing the claims made against him. JK Rowling also said that Amber Heard was hiding things and the fans did not know the complete story. This made her side with Johnny Depp. Filmmakers feel more comfortable working with a particular set of cast till the end of the film and the crew responsible for Fantastic Beasts were really happy to have Johnny be a part of them.  

Number 2: Javier Bardem
Javier Bardem decided to make a statement in which he mentioned that aside from the fact that he loved Depp, he had also been a complete gentleman and a caring friend towards him and his family.  He also said that he was with Johnny because he saw a loving and caring person, and an extraordinary person who was willing to help anyone in need. 

Number 1: Amber Heard’s parents
This one came as a shock, and you will not believe what happened. It all started with some leaked text messages between Amber’s parents and Johnny where they clearly stated that they were not comfortable with what happened. Amber Heard’s parents also pointed out that the true motive behind what Amber was doing was extortion and not abuse. Amber’s parents also told Depp that Amber’s lawyers were the ones responsible for him being sued. From the text messages that were leaked, we can all see that Amber’s parents did not believe what their daughter claimed had happened.
